summary: Gmail OAuth 2.0 & Browser-Use Library Integration Testing - All tests passed. 15 tools registered (including browser_use and gmail). Gmail OAuth endpoints work correctly: /status returns {connected: false}, /login returns 400 with proper error about missing credentials, /disconnect works. Dashboard shows Gmail panel with DISCONNECTED status and Connect button. Chat page loads correctly.
passed_tests: Root endpoint returns gateway info with 40+ RPC methods
Gmail login endpoint returns 400 with error about missing GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID/SECRET
Gmail disconnect endpoint works (returns 'No Gmail connection found')
15 tools registered including browser_use and gmail
browser_use tool has correct schema (task parameter, autonomous description)
gmail tool has correct schema (action enum: list, search, read, send)
WebSocket authentication works with gateway token
WebSocket authentication fails with invalid token
Gmail panel shows DISCONNECTED status and Connect Gmail button
Chat page loads correctly with session sidebar and chat view
critical_code_review_comments: Gmail OAuth flow requires GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID and GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET to be configured in backend/.env to actually connect
browser_use tool now uses browser-use library (75k+ GitHub stars) for autonomous browser automation instead of custom implementation
context_for_next_testing_agent: Gmail OAuth endpoints are functional but require GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID and GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET env vars to actually complete OAuth flow. browser_use tool is registered and uses browser-use library. 15 tools total: web_search, execute_command, read_file, write_file, list_files, memory_search, browse_webpage, browser_use, system_info, http_request, analyze_image, transcribe_audio, parse_document, monitor_url, gmail.

gmail_oauth.login_endpoint: GET /api/oauth/gmail/login redirects to Google OAuth (400 if no credentials)

browser_use_tool.name: browser_use
browser_use_tool.description: Autonomous web browser agent using browser-use library

frontend.gmail_panel: Shows DISCONNECTED status, Connect Gmail button, OAuth 2.0 badge
frontend.chat_page: Loads with session sidebar and chat view
